Comment.value:
Feats

Blind Fight:
This feat has not changed, only the message shown in the combat log. That is, instead of seeing the base concealment you will see the concealment as modified by this feat and others that effect it.

Blinding Speed:
Duration: 60 seconds.
+2 AB, +4 Dodge AC, +1d8 Bludgeoning Damage, +4 Universal Saves

Epic Blinding Speed:
Requirement: 29 Dexterity, Blinding Speed
Duration: 90 seconds.
Uses per day: 2
Specifics: +3 AB, +1 Extra Attacks / Round, +5 Dodge AC, +2d8 Bludgeoning Damage, +5 Universal Saves

Legendary Blinding Speed:
Requirement: 33 Dexterity, Epic Blinding Speed
Duration: 120 seconds.
Uses per day: 3
Specifics: +4 AB, 2 Extra Attacks / Round, +5 Dodge AC, +3d8 Bludgeoning Damage, +6 Universal Saves

Circle Kick: 
Note if you do not have the custom hak you will not be able to take the original Circle Kick.
Type of Feat: General
Prerequisite: Base attack bonus +3, Dex 15+, Improved Unarmed Strike.
Specifics: While unarmed a character with the Circle Kick feat is able to kick in combat, thereby receiving an extra attack.
Use: Automatic.

Devastating Critical:
+1 to the critical hit multiplier of the chosen weapon. This feat will stack with the Weapon Master Increased Multiplier feat. Example: A scythe WM with the Dev. Crit. Scythe feat will have an x6 critical hit multiplier.

Epic Spell: Greater Ruin:
Extra use gained at caster level 40 (or Pale Master 30) & caster level 50 (or Pale Master 40) , for a total of 3 uses per day.

Epic Spell: Hellball:
Extra use gained at caster level 40 (or Pale Master 30) & caster level 50 (or Pale Master 40) , for a total of 3 uses per day.

Intuitive Attack:
1.Type of Feat: General.
2.Prerequisite: Base Attack Bonus 1.
3.Specifics: With a simple weapon or a natural weapon, you may use your Wisdom modifier instead your Strength modifier on attack rolls.
4.Use: Automatic.

Overwhelming Critical:
+1 to the critical hit threat range of the chosen weapon. This feat will NOT stack with the Weapon Master Ki Critical feat.

Unarmed Attack: 
Weapon Focus, Specialization, etc: All of the unarmed attack weapon feats now also work with creature attacks in shifter forms.

Weapon Finesse:
Katanas are finessable by medium sized creatures (i.e. everything but gnomes and halflings)

Improved Whirlwind Attack:
This feat has been changed such that it only will have an affect if used by Shadowdancers or Weapon Masters.

value.0:
Feats

Blind Fight:
This feat has not changed, only the message shown in the combat log. That is, instead of seeing the base concealment you will see the concealment as modified by this feat and others that effect it.

Blinding Speed:
Duration: 60 seconds.
+2 AB, +4 Dodge AC, +1d8 Bludgeoning Damage, +4 Universal Saves

Epic Blinding Speed:
Requirement: 29 Dexterity, Blinding Speed
Duration: 90 seconds.
Uses per day: 2
Specifics: +3 AB, +1 Extra Attacks / Round, +5 Dodge AC, +2d8 Bludgeoning Damage, +5 Universal Saves

Legendary Blinding Speed:
Requirement: 33 Dexterity, Epic Blinding Speed
Duration: 120 seconds.
Uses per day: 3
Specifics: +4 AB, 2 Extra Attacks / Round, +5 Dodge AC, +3d8 Bludgeoning Damage, +6 Universal Saves

Circle Kick: 
Note if you do not have the custom hak you will not be able to take the original Circle Kick.
Type of Feat: General
Prerequisite: Base attack bonus +3, Dex 15+, Improved Unarmed Strike.
Specifics: While unarmed a character with the Circle Kick feat is able to kick in combat, thereby receiving an extra attack.
Use: Automatic.

Devastating Critical:
+1 to the critical hit multiplier of the chosen weapon. This feat will stack with the Weapon Master Increased Multiplier feat. Example: A scythe WM with the Dev. Crit. Scythe feat will have an x6 critical hit multiplier.

Epic Spell: Greater Ruin:
Extra use gained at caster level 40 (or Pale Master 30) & caster level 50 (or Pale Master 40) , for a total of 3 uses per day.

Epic Spell: Hellball:
Extra use gained at caster level 40 (or Pale Master 30) & caster level 50 (or Pale Master 40) , for a total of 3 uses per day.

Intuitive Attack:
1.Type of Feat: General.
2.Prerequisite: Base Attack Bonus 1.
3.Specifics: With a simple weapon or a natural weapon, you may use your Wisdom modifier instead your Strength modifier on attack rolls.
4.Use: Automatic.

Overwhelming Critical:
+1 to the critical hit threat range of the chosen weapon. This feat will NOT stack with the Weapon Master Ki Critical feat.

Unarmed Attack: 
Weapon Focus, Specialization, etc: All of the unarmed attack weapon feats now also work with creature attacks in shifter forms.

Weapon Finesse:
Katanas are finessable by medium sized creatures (i.e. everything but gnomes and halflings)

Improved Whirlwind Attack:
This feat has been changed such that it only will have an affect if used by Shadowdancers or Weapon Masters.
